channel.title: Times of India
channel.description: The Times of India: Breaking news, views, reviews, cricket from across India
channel.copyright: Copyright:(C) 2013 Bennett Coleman & Co. Ltd, http://info.indiatimes.com/terms/tou.html

item.title: Heavy rain disrupts life in Mumbai, parts of Maharashtra
item.description: Train services on the Mumbai-Ahmedabad and Mumbai-New Delhi sectors were affected since early morning today, officials said.

item.title: Cong will not declare Rahul as PM candidate, Modi poses no challenge: Digvijaya
item.description: Digvijaya Singh did not say whether PM Manmohan Singh could be a candidate for the top post once again if the party wins next year's elections.

item.title: MS Dhoni wins tri-series for India, says he is blessed with good cricketing sense
item.description: He has made a habit of coming good when the chips are down and Dhoni feels his finishing skills have a lot to do with good cricketing sense he is "blessed" with.

item.title: Airport check of artificial leg left woman in tears
item.description: The security staff at the airport had demanded that this 38-year-old marketing professional from Mumbai take off her prosthetic leg to be separately passed through security check.

item.title: Andhra CM meets Sonia ahead of Cong meet on Telangana
item.description: A decision on Telangana is being taken amid a talk for an alliance with YSR Jaganmohan Reddy's YSR Congress in the state.
